alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Kenosha; Racine; Walworth; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 6:24AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Walworth, western Racine, southern Waukesha, southeastern Jefferson and western Kenosha Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 623 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Palmyra to near Sharon. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Muskego, Antioch, Whitewater, Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, Mukwonago, Union Grove, East Troy, Paddock Lake, Williams Bay, Camp Lake, Wind Lake, Twin Lakes, Spring Grove, Rochester, Wheatland, Genoa City, Walworth, and Silver Lake. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 12 between mile markers 320 and 338. Interstate 43 between mile markers 14 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
